root.texto: That #ElectionDay thread you always wanted? The one with polling location info for every state casting ballots tomorrow? Here it is… #Arizona 🌵 https://t.co/CJVKghjf8w #California 😎🌊 Find your county's site here https://t.co/dEmKu7ia9x or call (800) 345-VOTE (8683) #Colorado 🏔️ Use the widget on the right to find your voting or drop-off location https://t.co/QOdHtiIrRt #Connecticut 🏡 https://t.co/X3uHDaEnJU #Florida🌴https://t.co/GxogY3VNib #Georgia 🍑 Find out where to vote: https://t.co/bksguWomjG #Idaho 🥔 Check your County Clerk's office for hours & locations https://t.co/E7NpG4l8Fe #Kansas 🌻 Find your polling info: https://t.co/dfWBUbPMrT #Maine 🌲 Find out where to vote: https://t.co/ptEljLkaXm #Massachusetts 🍀 Find your polling place: https://t.co/d5oxo2LtXy #Michigan ⛸️ https://t.co/4w0vZ7lviu #Minnesota 🧣 Find your polling place info: https://t.co/QcIRwbxmmy #Mississippi 🦌 Find out where to vote: https://t.co/5qHUnSRE0Z #Missouri 👀 Find out where to vote: https://t.co/muF7Tqs6TH #NewHampshire ⛰️ Find your polling place info: https://t.co/drLvx6RtVo #NewJersey 🏖️ Find out where to vote: https://t.co/RclQwIXBUY #NewYork 🗽 Find your polling info: https://t.co/jl3QdsZBO9 #NorthCarolina 🛩️ Find out where to vote: https://t.co/O7mEINcIcd #Ohio 🐦 Find your polling place info: https://t.co/z2f9fsQlJD #Pennsylvania 🔔 Find our where to vote: https://t.co/V3lgWuMz0Z #SouthCarolina 🌴🌙 Find your polling info: https://t.co/qNyo6Aa9H0 #Texas ⭐️ Find out where to vote: https://t.co/0kMMWE3aq0 #Utah 🏞️ Find your polling info: https://t.co/Sq1xJjvJJH #Virginia ❤️ Find out where to vote: https://t.co/P00fBWmkJA #Washington 🌲 Find your drop box or voting center: https://t.co/MQx532JHRY #WestVirginia ⛰️ Find out where to vote: https://t.co/Dr3CKjJ4sX Did we miss one? Let us know. 🙏 to @ballotpedia for a killer calendar https://t.co/kUYnOxUMUj /end Thanks to @CatalinaLinx for flagging: Knoxville, TN find your info here to vote for City Council: https://t.co/XtX73LEuSu Thanks, @rabbittopia! Oregon, find your drop-box here: https://t.co/mR168Q01s4
